entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - multiBTC Live, SBF Arrested, Ren to Shut Down 1.0, and More...
entry.summary: Product Launches 🚀 Multichain multiBTC Live Multichain launches multiBTC and a BTC bridge. Meanwhile, Curve launches a multiBTC/WBTC/sBTC pool and launched a proposal vote for adding liquidity incentives to the pool. Yearn veYFI Live Yearn launched the staking UI for veYFI. Previously, users can take part in governance using YFI, and going forward veYFI will be the only governance token on Yearn.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Magic Eden Supports Polygon, Phi Live on Polygon, DEX Aggregator with No Slippage, and More...
entry.summary: Magic Eden Supports Polygon NFT marketplace Magic Eden now supports buy/sell/mint Polygon NFTs. Phi Launches on Polygon Phi.xyz, a metaverse project built around ENS & wallet activities, launches Phi Land & Phi Quest on Polygon, allowing users to create lands and/or explore quests of projects.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Maple 2.0, MakerDAO to Fund RWA, Stable Farms on Optimism, and More...
entry.summary: Maple Released 2.0 Maple releases a new version that focuses on diversifying borrowers and improving risk management parameters. Maple recently experienced a borrower default. MakerDAO to Fund RWA MakerDAO passed the executive vote and will deploy four vaults to fund investments in real-world assets (RWA), originated by BlockTower and issued on-chain through

entry.title: The decentralized CEO
entry.summary: If you read the title, and saw the oxymoron, you get it.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Yearn veYFI Live, Sushi Voting to Increase Treasury Ratio, Trading Volatility, and More...
entry.summary: Yearn veYFI Live Yearn launches UI for users to stake YFI for veYFI. Previously, users can take part in governance using YFI, and going forward veYFI will be the only governance token on Yearn. Signal Vote: Increase Sushi Kanpai Payout Ratio The Sushiswap community is voting to produce a signal on whether to redirect 100% of the Sushi fees redirect to the Kanpai Treasury for 1-year.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - MakerDAO Key Deployments, SBF Arrested, Interest-Free Borrowing, and More...
entry.summary: MakerDAO Key Deployments Maker executed a bunch of proposals today. Key deployments include DSR Savings increase to 1%, GNO onboarding, and renBTC-A offboarding, among other changes. SBF Arrested SBF has been arrested in the Bahamas the day before appearing before Congress. Reports say the US is likely to request extradition.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Perennial Live, Lodestar Exploit, Maple 2.0, and More...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of Dec. 5th

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Ethereum Shanghai Coming 2023, DeFi Kingdoms Live on Klaytn, Farming on Arbitrum, and More...
entry.summary: Ethereum Shanghai Coming 2023 Ethereum developers set March 2023 as a tentative shipping date for the Shanghai upgrade. The upgrade will enable staked ETH withdrawals, and implement big EOF and warm coinbase, etc., among other updates. DeFi Kingdoms, LayerZero on Klaytn

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Perennial Live, Compound Extensions, Farming on Arbitrum, and More...
entry.summary: Perennial Live Derivatives protocol Perennial is now live on the Ethereum mainnet. Perennial offers infrastructure for derivative markets, with V1 currently supporting Long-ETH, Short-ETH, and Long-Squeeth markets. Compound Extensions Compound releases Extensions for its V3 users. Extensions are a series of add-on features to enhance users’ experience, including Advance Transactions, Position Migrator, Position Management (by

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Amber Group Financial Problems, Tessera Live, Automated Strategies, and More...
entry.summary: Amber Group Financial Problems Amber Group, an Asia crypto firm, seems to have liquidity problems according to on-chain analysis. Amber’s asset management platform WhaleFin and CeDeFi lending protocol Clearpool are the two related firms/borrowers that might be affected by Amber’s shortage of funds. (source:

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Maple Cuts Orthogonal, APE Staking Live, Lending on BnB Chain, and More...
entry.summary: Maple Cuts Orthogonal Orthogonal Trading, a crypto firm that has funds stuck on FTX, and is also a significant borrower on lending protocol Maple Finance, has defaulted on eight loans totalling $36 million on Maple. Creditor M11 Credit issued a default notice to Orthogonal for its loans, while Maple severed all ties with Orthogonal for misrepresenting its financial position.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Uniswap NFT Aggregator, LINK Staking Coming, Aave Froze V2 Markets, and More...
entry.summary: Recap: Week of Nov. 28th

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Ankr aBNB Exploit, Fantom Gas Monetization, Explore Delta Neutral Strategies, and More...
entry.summary: Ankr aBNBc Exploit BnB chain node operator Ankr suffered a governance key compromise. The attacker d deployed a malicious contract to mint a very large amount of aBNBc, Ankr’s reward-bearing staked BNB token, and profited ~$7m by dumping what he minted.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Uniswap NFT Aggregator, LINK Staking Update, Trading Options on Arbitrum, and More...
entry.summary: Uniswap NFT Aggregator Uniswap launches its NFT aggregator, allowing users to search, trade, and discover trends on NFTs. LINK Staking Update Chainlink is launching staking v0.1 on Dec. 6th. Stakers will be locking their funds til the planned launch of v0.2 (in 9-12 months) when the funds can be unlocked or migrated.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Phantom to Support Ethereum, Polygon, BracketX Live on Arbitrum, Borrowing on Arbitrum, and More...
entry.summary: Phantom to Support Ethereum, Polygon Solana-based wallet Phantom will launch beta and public access for storing/transferring tokens and NFTs on Ethereum and Polygon. BracketX Live on Arbitrum Structured product protocol BracketX is live on Arbitrum. BracketX is one of Bracket Protocol’s products, providing

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Aave Freezes V2 Markets, AdaSwap Live on Cardano, Trading NFT Perps, and More...
entry.summary: Aave Freezes V2 Markets Aave governance has temporarily frozen 17 lending markets on V2 to fend off further liquidity attacks. Paused markets include YFI, CRV, ZRX, MANA, 1INCH, MKR, etc. AdaSwap Live on Cardano Mainnet Cardano-based DEX Adaswap is now live on mainnet, enabling trading & bridging for Cardano tokens and NFTs.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - nftperp Beta Live, Binance Industry Recovery Initiative, Pendle V2 AMM, and More...
entry.summary: Product Launches 🚀 nftperp Beta Live NFT derivative protocol nftperp launches closed beta for whitelisted users, with PUNK/ETH and BAYC/ETH pairs live for trading. Tranchess on Ethereum & qETH Live BnB-based yield protocol Tranchess expands to Ethereum with its own ETH staking product qETH live for stakers to earn yield.

entry.title: Fantom: an inside financial peak at being a “crypto company”
entry.summary: 16 June 2018 — Fantom raised $40,000,000 (mostly in ETH @ $450-$700).

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Binance Recovery Fund, Pendle V2 AMM, Trading BTC/ETH Volatility, and More...
entry.summary: Binance Industry Recovery Initiative Binance led a $1b Industry Recovery Initiative (IRI) to fund web3 developments. Third-party firms and ventures including Jump Crypto, Aptos Labs, Polygon Ventures, Animoca Brands, GSR, Kronos, and Brooker Group have joined and contributed another $50m to the co-investment.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Ape NFTs Marketplace Live, Volmex V2 Live on Polygon, L2 Lending, and More...
entry.summary: Ape NFTs Marketplace Live A white-label marketplace for ApeCoin DAO, built by Snag Solutions, launches today. The marketplace will sell BAYC, MAYC, BAKC, and Otherdeed NFTs. Fees charged on sellers will be 5% on ETH sales and .25% on APE, and a full .25% of each sale is held in a multi-sig to fund DAO initiatives.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - crvUSD Whitepaper, Ankr Supports Sui, Intro to Polynomial, and More...
entry.summary: crvUSD Whitepaper Curve team releases the code and whitepaper for its stablecoin crvUSD. Curve stablecoin will be overcollateralized with crypto assets and will rely on the Lending-Liquidating AMM (LLAMMA) algorithm to manage potential collateralization risks.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Ren to Sunset 1.0, rETH as DAI Collateral, Intro to Quoll Finance, and More...
entry.summary: Ren to Sunset 1.0 While working on the 2.0, Ren will sunset its 1.0 within 30 days. Ren-assets holders are recommended to redeem their assets to avoid potential damage/fund loss. rETH as DAI Collateral MakerDAO has deployed rETH (RocketPool staked ETH) as a new collateral type to generate DAI. The rETH-A vault has the min. collateral ratio of 170%, a 1.5% stability fee, and a 5m DAI debt ceiling.
